job.title: DE LAPP/SAR Underwriter
job.description: If you are a Mortgage Underwriter with experience please read onltbrgtltbrgtWe are a 10 plus year company affiliated with a local builder looking to start up our underwriting department Do to our continuous growth and demand for our services we decided to keep our loans in house If you are a self starter and looking for a challenge to help establish and grow our underwriting department then manage this department as we grow Please apply nowltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Will Be DoingltbrgtltbrgtYou will be underwriting mainly new construction builds and purchase mortgages We are looking for a self motivated individual that wants to start our underwriting department and give us ideas on how to make our underwriting department successful You will need to be well versed in FHA VA and conventional mortgages to help us grow and then manage the underwriting department down the roadltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Need for this Positionltbrgtltulgtltligt DEltligtltligt LAPPSARltligtltligt EncompassltbrgtltligtltulgtWhats In It for Youltbrgtltulgtltligt Salary range 90k to 110kltligtltligt Full Benefitsltligtltligt Individual paid health insuranceltbrgtltligtltulgtSo ToltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may
